short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ifYes assistant to find opportunities to buy things you want

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ifYes..?  This extension is the future!

You spend a lot of time choosing the right things, you are interested in almost everything, but don't let yourself buy?

Have you ever thought that you can buy anything?
Well, if you do not buy immediately, then buy in installments.
Well, if not in installments, then in credit!
Or for rent?
Or choose a third-party product, or agree to other characteristics...

Our development, enhanced by our partners, will help you to always be aware of prices and convenient purchase offers. We are always looking for new partnerships so that you can afford more!

How to use ifYes shopping assistant:
1. Highlight the name of any thing or service (text).
2. Get 2 buttons below: green and yellow.
3. By clicking on them you get new tab with offers.
4. Calculate.. get credit or in installments.
5. Other.. get similar offers to buy cheaper.
When you click on these buttons (green and yellow), you will always receive offers in new browser windows.

Draw your attention to clicking these buttons, you send the selected text (name of the product) to our partner so that he can form a high-quality offer for you to purchase the product you have chosen.

At any time you can disable the extension by clicking on the icon of our extension on the corresponding browser panel, a window will open and select what you need: ifYes - on, off.

You often read instructions, try on a product for yourself, look for convenient functionality, compare options - you are here, extension ifYes!


+++++++++++
By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’ and installing this extension on your desktop, you are accepting and agreeing to install the IFYES Chrome extension, and understand that your browser provider will be replaced to that provided by the service, changing startup page and default search to  that provided by the service, and the Privacy and Terms of Use of the extension.
